title: When restarting Task 2 Checkpoint 2, Solar Array is not put back in rover

content.raw:
When val falls while carrying the solar array in Task 2 Checkpoint 2 I restart the checkpoint. Val is reharnessed in start box, but the solar array is left on the path where it fell. The official rules state:

 Reset or fall while attempting checkpoint 2.
    - Re-harness at location in front of the solar panel on the rover, and the solar panel will be moved back to the rover.

Here is a picture after reharnessing, note the solar array on the ground across from the solar box: 

![restart 2.2 solar array left behind.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/xEbAAe/images/4045018397-restart_2.2_solar_array_left_behind.png)

Thanks!
Rebecca
